line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "10 hot dogs, cut into thirds")
create_ing(ing1, "15 slices bacon, cut in half")

line.originaltext: Wrap 1/2 slice of bacon around each piece of hot dog.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1}, ing3, "bacon dogs", "wrap 1/2 slice around each piece")

line.originaltext: Secure the bacon with a toothpick.
Secure the bacon with a toothpick.
line.annotation: do(ing3, t0, ing4, "secured bacon dogs", "secure with toothpick")

line.originaltext: Place hot dogs into a slow cooker on low heat.
Place hot dogs into a slow cooker on low heat.
Pour brown sugar over hot dogs, let cook for 5 to 6 hours; until the bacon is cooked.
Pour brown sugar over hot dogs, let cook for 5 to 6 hours; until the bacon is cooked.
line.annotation: cook(ing6, t1, ing7, "cooked dogs", "5 to 6 hours")

line.originaltext: Pour brown sugar over hot dogs, let cook for 5 to 6 hours; until the bacon is cooked.
